property.name: openBehavior
property.label: Open behavior
property.description: Choose modal (default), newTab, or inline to render DocFab.

property.name: recordModelId
property.label: Record Model Id
property.description: Optional DocFab record model id to force (highest priority).

property.name: formUuid
property.label: Form UUID

property.name: formTypeUniqueName
property.label: Form Type (Unique Name)

property.label: Allow Multiple DocFabricator Journals (Lead only)
